DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety improve ovarian function polycystic ovarian syndrome adult . Half patient receive Dong 's extra-point acupuncture therapy , half receive Diane-35 control group .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Safety Study Acupuncture Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Both Dong 's extra-point acupuncture therapy Diane-35 could improve symptom patient polycystic ovarian syndrome , definite evidence indicate acupuncture could play role improve ovarian function . So design study observe change follicular development , ovary size sex hormone ( testosterone , follitropin , luteinizing hormone ) acupuncture treatment , noninferiority comparison Diane-35 definite efficacy advantage acupuncture .
DOC.mesh_term: Cyproterone acetate , ethinyl estradiol drug combination
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject polycystic ovarian syndrome . 2 . Subject n't take hormone medicine reproductive endocrine drug 3 month . 3 . Subject serious systematic disease . 1 . Unwillingness accept either two intervention 2 . Contraindications acupuncture : pacemaker use bleed disorder 3 . Blood pressure high 160/100mmHg , serious diabetes liver kidney function deficiency .
